Getting Started

Register to KubeMQ

KubeMQ server is free to use anytime. Registration is needed to obtain KubeMQ token ,Register KubeMQ.

Get KubeMQ

Quick Wizard

Please visit Get KubeMQ wizard for quick set up guide.

Manually

KubeMQ is delivered via small Docker container. KubeMQ Docker container can be pulled from Docker Hub or by downloading a tar file from GitHub.

Docker Hub:

Run

$ sudo docker pull docker.io/kubemq/kubemq
1

GitHub tar file:

Option 1: Download kubemq.tar from GitHub

$ sudo docker import kubemq.tar
1

Option 2:

$ sudo docker import https://github.com/kubemq-io/kubemq/releases/[tag:release]
1
